original_text: Some of you may say, ‘We are free to do anything that we want to do!’ But not everything is good for you to do. You may say, ‘We are free to do anything!’ But not everything helps you to be strong as a believer.
korean_text: 모든 것이 가하나 모든 것이 유익한 것은 아니요 모든 것이 가하나 모든 것이 덕을 세우는 것은 아니니

sentences.original_text: We are free to do anything
But not everything is good for you
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 모든 것이 너희에게 유익한 것은 아니다

sentences.original_text: We are free to do anything

sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 모든 것이 너희를 돕지는 않는다

sentences.original_text: to be strong as a believer
